mapper.select: SELECT t.*, (t.pos_qty1 + t.pos_qty2 + t.pos_qty3 + t.pos_qty4) AS pos_qty FROM (SELECT sd.item_subno as barcode, sd.item_name as product_name, sd.stock_qty, IF(sg1.pos_qty IS NULL, 0, sg1.pos_qty) AS pos_qty1, IF(sg2.pos_qty IS NULL, 0, sg2.pos_qty) AS pos_qty2, IF(sg3.pos_qty IS NULL, 0, sg3.pos_qty) AS pos_qty3, IF(sg4.pos_qty IS NULL, 0, sg4.pos_qty) AS pos_qty4 FROM t_store_detail sd LEFT JOIN t_sales_week_total_goods_1 sg1 ON sd.item_subno = sg1.item_subno AND sd.org_id = sg1.org_id LEFT JOIN t_sales_week_total_goods_2 sg2 ON sd.item_subno = sg2.item_subno AND sd.org_id = sg2.org_id LEFT JOIN t_sales_week_total_goods_3 sg3 ON sd.item_subno = sg3.item_subno AND sd.org_id = sg3.org_id LEFT JOIN t_sales_week_total_goods_4 sg4 ON sd.item_subno = sg4.item_subno AND sd.org_id = sg4.org_id WHERE sd.org_id = #{orgId} ) AS t ORDER BY pos_qty DESC

SELECT t.*, (t.pos_qty1 + t.pos_qty2 + t.pos_qty3 + t.pos_qty4) AS pos_qty FROM (SELECT org.org_name as org_id, sd.item_subno as barcode, sd.item_name as product_name, sd.stock_qty, IF(sg1.pos_qty IS NULL, 0, sg1.pos_qty) AS pos_qty1, IF(sg2.pos_qty IS NULL, 0, sg2.pos_qty) AS pos_qty2, IF(sg3.pos_qty IS NULL, 0, sg3.pos_qty) AS pos_qty3, IF(sg4.pos_qty IS NULL, 0, sg4.pos_qty) AS pos_qty4 FROM t_organization org, t_store_detail sd LEFT JOIN t_sales_week_total_goods_1 sg1 ON sd.item_subno = sg1.item_subno AND sd.org_id = sg1.org_id LEFT JOIN t_sales_week_total_goods_2 sg2 ON sd.item_subno = sg2.item_subno AND sd.org_id = sg2.org_id LEFT JOIN t_sales_week_total_goods_3 sg3 ON sd.item_subno = sg3.item_subno AND sd.org_id = sg3.org_id LEFT JOIN t_sales_week_total_goods_4 sg4 ON sd.item_subno = sg4.item_subno AND sd.org_id = sg4.org_id WHERE sd.item_subno = #{barcode} AND sd.org_id = org.org_id ) AS t
